sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & Identity Foundation
key_deliverables: AKS Cluster; PostgreSQL DB; Backend Auth Module; Mobile Offline Architecture Design
demo_objectives: Show working backend authentication and infrastructure deployment pipelines.
success_criteria: Infrastructure deployed via Terraform; Backend Auth tests passing; Mobile Architecture approved.
risk_factors: Azure AD B2C configuration complexity; Offline sync architecture validation.
mitigation_strategies: Mock B2C for local dev; Prototype sync logic early.

sprint_goal: Core Business Logic & Offline Mobile Architecture
key_deliverables: Service Request State Machine; Geospatial Routing Engine; Mobile Offline Database & Queue
demo_objectives: Demo API routing logic with test polygons; Demo mobile app queueing offline requests.
success_criteria: Routing logic passes unit tests; Mobile app persists data offline.
risk_factors: Geospatial query performance; Mobile sync conflict resolution complexity.
mitigation_strategies: Load test PostGIS queries; Implement simple Last-Write-Wins policy first.

key_deliverables: WebSocket Gateway; Mobile Biometric Login; Location Broadcasting
demo_objectives: Show real-time location updates on map; Biometric login on device.
success_criteria: WebSocket gateway handles 1k concurrent; Biometrics work on iOS/Android.
risk_factors: WebSocket latency; Mobile background execution limits.
mitigation_strategies: Implement client-side throttling; Use native background location modules.
